page.title: 19A mum's day in Framlingham
page.content:
This item is written by Michelle who is 10 years old. Her father is a butcher in the town of Framlingham.
Mum gets up at 6.45 in the morning,gets dressed, gets me up and off to school. She does the housework but if some-one is away she helps my dad in the shop. She gets my dinner ready and then she washes up. She has her own dinner. She is always washing clothes and things. She may watch T.V. for a little while. She goes to the International shop for bits and bobs and to the greengrocer, but on Friday she goes to the Co-op. When she has finished that she will make everyone's tea. She will either take the dogs for a walk or have a game of ball, then she will get me to bed.
